correspondence.message: I am a M.Sc. Informatik student and would like to start writing my thesis. I have two questions: 1- Is it possible to do the thesis with an advisor from another department of TUM, like School of Management? 2- What are the requirements that my thesis has to satisfy? Please feel free to suggest any additional resources."

Yes, the supervisor can be from any school, but the examiner must meet the criteria outlined on our website: https://www.cit.tum.de/en/cit/studies/students/thesis-completing-your-studies/informatics/. The requirements your thesis has to satisfy will be agreed upon with your examiner and is highly individual, depending on the topic of your thesis.
